B

BaseFrame - Class in UI
The frame (JFrame) used in minesweeper initialises the gameLogic and screens handles the changing of screens
BaseFrame(String) - Constructor for class UI.BaseFrame
 
Board - Class in minesweeper
Keeps track of the status of the gameBoard has 2 int[][] arrays, 1 for tile status and 1 for boardData keeps count of bombAmount, Size and used flags
BoardScreen - Class in UI.screens
Author: Shiera extends screen Screen that shows the game board is drawn here
BoardScreen(GameLogic, BaseFrame) - Constructor for class UI.screens.BoardScreen
Constructor that calls the default constructor of screen
BoardSizeOptions - Enum in minesweeper
 
BoardStatus - Enum in minesweeper
Enum used by Board for keeping track of the status of the tiles on the board
BOMB - Static variable in class minesweeper.Board
-1 stands for bomb in boardData
Button - Class in UI
Author: Shiera Buttons Can have either 1 or 2 images Button is a toggleButton if if has 2 images toggleOn/toggle of does nothing if there's only 1 image
Button(BaseFrame, String, String, int, int, ButtonHandler, boolean) - Constructor for class UI.Button
Constructor used to toggleButton
Button(BaseFrame, String, String, int, int, ButtonHandler) - Constructor for class UI.Button
Constructor used to toggleButton
Button(BaseFrame, String, int, int, ButtonHandler) - Constructor for class UI.Button
Constructor used to not toggleButtons
ButtonHandler - Interface in UI
Author: Shiera Something that handles button clicks.
